subject: AI & Agents
title: Coreference Resolution: Who Is 'They'?
description: A 1-minute de-risking session on Coreference Resolution: Who Is 'They'?.

hook.text: 'The team won the game. They celebrated all night.' Who is 'they'?

buildup.text: Coreference resolution links pronouns and references back to the entities they refer to.

discovery.text: It groups all mentions of the same entity into clusters across the document.

twist.text: Ambiguous cases: 'The trophy didn't fit in the suitcase because it was too big.' What's 'it'?

climax.text: Coreference is critical for document summarization, QA, and knowledge graph construction.

punchline.text: Every 'it,' 'they,' and 'she' points somewhere. Find where.

quiz.question: What does coreference resolution do?
options: Links pronouns back to the entities they refer to
